subscribe.preferred-language: What is your preferred official language of communication?

error-message.email-match: The email addresses entered do not match
error-message.email-valid: Enter an email address in the correct format, such as name@example.com

success.subscribe-successful: You have successfully subscribed to Canada Dental Care Plan. You will receive emails at {{userEmailAddress}} when important new Canada Dental Care Plan information is available in your My Service Canada Account.
success.change-email: If you wish to update your email address, navigate to <personalInformationLink>Manage my Personal Information</personalInformationLink>.

manage.preferred-language: What is your preferred official language of communication?
manage.unsubscribe-note: Select <unsubscribelink>Unsubscribe from CDCP email alerts</unsubscribelink> to complete the process to no longer receive emails when important new CDCP claim information is available.

error-message.email-match: The email addresses entered do not match
error-message.email-valid: Enter an email address in the correct format, such as name@example.com

unsubscribe.note: If you unsubscribe from CDCP email alerts, you will no longer receive emails when important new CDCP information is available. Email address to be cancelled is: {{email}}

error-message.agree-required: Check "I Agree" prior to selecting Unsubscribe from CDCP email alerts.

breadcrumbs.subscribe: Confirm to subscribe to CDCP email alerts

confirm.confirmation-information-text: A confirmation code, required to finish the registration process, will be sent to {{userEmailAddress}}. This step must be completed within the next 48 hours or by immediately entering the confirmation code below.
confirm.confirmation-completed-text: Upon completion, you will begin to receive email alerts when important information for your Canada Dental Care Plan application is available.
confirm.code-sent-by-email: You have requested a new confirmation code and will receive an email at {{userEmailAddress}} to finish the registration process. This final step which must be completed within the next 48 hours, will allow you to reveive emails when important new Canadian Dental Care plan information is available in your My Service Canada Account.
confirm.invalid: The confirmation code you entered does not match our records. Please request a new confirmation code or ensure you are entering the correct confirmation code you received.

success.unsubscribe-successful: You have successfully unsubscribed from Canada Dental Care Plan. You will no longer receive emails when important new Canada Dental Care Plan information is available in your My Service Canada Account.
success.subscribe-again: You may subscribe again to Canada Dental Care Plan alerts by <subscribelink>completing the subscription process</subscribelink>.
